title: Drew Barrymore Swears by This Drugstore Brush and Dry Shampoo
text: February 22, 2017 Steve Granitz If you’ve been on Instagram in the past couple of days looking for cool beauty products (guilty!) you’ve probably seen Drew Barrymore’s hashtag, #BeautyJunkieWeek, or comments like, "Omg, Drew Barrymore swears by this drugstore brush!" Recently the actress posted a slew of her favorite beauty brands , and many of them can be found in your local drugstore. Thanks to the launch of Flower Beauty (we're crushing hard on Flower In Your Prime Ultimate Eye Primer BTW) and the fact that she practically grew up in the makeup artists chair, we know Barrymore has a healthy love for makeup. But, thanks to her #BeautyJunkieWeek posts on Instagram we understand her love for makeup runs deeper than beauty. The actress is also into hair care (I mean, Drew Barrymore's hair is always pretty awesome so it makes perfect sense) and luckily, her favorites are a few of ours, too. You May Also Like Hair 8 Things You Didn't Know About Hair-Smoothing Treatments Take for instance the Wet brush that she not only uses on herself, but also on her kids. "#beautyjunkieweek one for me and one for my girls. Also travel friendly for adults on the go. I swear by this brush for me and my kids. Hence the two sizes #kidfriendly," she captioned. If Drew Barrymore swears by this drugstore brush, then it might be pretty legit. More drugstore hair-care products to get into:
